21  """This module represents Punjabi language. 
22   
23  For more information, see U{http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Punjabi_language} 
24  """ 
25   
26  import re 
27   
28  from translate.lang import common 
29   

30 -class pa(common.Common): 

31      """This class represents Punjabi.""" 
32   
33      sentenceend = u"।!?…" 
34   
35      sentencere = re.compile(r"""(?s)    #make . also match newlines 
36                              .*?         #anything, but match non-greedy 
37                              [%s]        #the puntuation for sentence ending 
38                              \s+         #the spacing after the puntuation 
39                              (?=[^a-z\d])#lookahead that next part starts with caps 
40                              """ % sentenceend, re.VERBOSE) 
41   
42      puncdict = { 
43          u". ": u"। ", 
44          u".\n": u"।\n", 
45      } 
46   
47      ignoretests = ["startcaps", "simplecaps"] 

48
